Name: Mushroom Pizza
Title: Mushroom Pizza
Desc: They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it...

Talent.Name: Mushroom Pizza
Talent.Desc: Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
